extendedInfo.description: Camcorder Lite is a simple to use video recording application that allows user to record and store videos within the app.Press "+" on the Home page to begin recording secure videos. Videos recorded this way will only be accessible through the B-Secure Camcorder app. These videos will not appear in your File Directory or Video Gallery. Uninstalling this app removes all videos recorded with it. For enquiries, please contact custsvc at b-securetech.com Powered by B-Secure Technologies - www.bstmobile.com

reviews.title: Not very useful for me
reviews.comment: Recorded videos are playable only in this app - no standart files.
reviews.author: A Google User
